text: Ezɨ Sol akar kam baregha kamaghɨn Devit mɨgei, “Noki, kɨ arazir kuram gami. Ezɨ Devit nan borim, nɨ uamategh na bagh izɨ. Kɨ ua nɨ gasɨghasɨghsɨ nɨghnɨghan kogham. Kɨ fo, dɨmagarir kamɨn nɨ bar atam na mɨsoghezɨ kɨ aremeghai. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nan araziba bar ikufi. Kɨ amizir arazir kam, a tong suvizir puvatɨ.”
